sentences.sContent: They moved the furniture back to practise their dance routine.
sentences.sCn: 他们把家具往后挪以便练习舞蹈动作。

sentences.sContent: It gives students the opportunity to practice their speaking skills.
sentences.sCn: 这给学生提供了锻炼口才的机会。

synos.tran: 练习，实践；实施，实行；从事

words.tran: 可用的；行得通的；可实行的
实践；练习；惯做（practise的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to do an activity, often regularly, in order to improve your skill or to prepare for a test
